column.name: state
column.remarks: 订单状态： No_Finished("未录入", (byte) 0), No_Delivery("未送货", (byte) 1), In_Transit("在途中", (byte) 2), Registered("已登记", (byte) 3), Waitfor_Park("等待进园", (byte) 4), Entering_Park("正在进园", (byte) 5), In_Park("园区中", (byte) 6), Enter_Storage("已进厂", (byte) 7), Outerter_Storage("已出厂", (byte) 8), Leaveing_Park("正在出园", (byte) 9), Leave_Park("已出园", (byte) 10), Completed("已完成", (byte) 11), Cancel("已撤销", (byte) 12),

column.name: status
column.remarks: 状态：UNREGISTER("未登记", (byte) 2),// 非正常卸货送货单更新成未登记状态
